## Train and ferry stations in LMA

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#read data
train_stations = readRDS(url("https://github.com/U-Shift/biclar/releases/download/0.0.1/train_stations.Rds"))
ferry_stations = readRDS(url("https://github.com/U-Shift/biclar/releases/download/0.0.1/ferry_stations.Rds"))

mapview::mapview(train_stations) + mapview::mapview(ferry_stations, col.regions= "red")
```
